notes: The commit c44a1dde (v3.11, Nov 2024) was added via batch metadata update PR #9285. However, the upstream has since released v3.021 in Oct 2025. The original font update PR #7103 (Jan 2024) used commit 403b1a6 (v3.008). There may be a mismatch between deployed fonts and metadata commit.

pending_questions.question: Should Lora be updated to v3.021? Are there breaking changes between v3.11 and v3.021?
